properties.name: Mogollon Monster
properties.description:
In Arizona folklore, the Mogollon Monster (/mʌɡɪˈjoʊn/ or /moʊɡəˈjoʊn/)[1] is a creature said to dwell in central and eastern Arizona along the Mogollon Rim.

Reports of footprints, video, and hair samples have been documented by enthusiasts. Mainstream biologists remain skeptical to the existence of such a creature.
